transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good morning sir. Speaking from IndiaMART.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir, IndiaMART is calling. You are not using it.
Customer: Abhi to mai ek ghante pehle dekh raha tha mai usko.
Executive: Accha accha. Sir, kaafi din se inactive hai isliye maine call kiya aapko. To ab use karna start karenge aap?
Customer: Madam, abhi ek ghante pehle to mai dekh hi raha tha. Aapko nahi dikh raha hai system me?
Executive: Sir, by-leads vagarah consume kiye hote to dikhta mujhe. Ek ghante pehle aap.
Customer: Consume to tabhi karenge. Are madam, consume tabhi to karenge, kuch aayega tabhi to karenge. Dekh to rahe hai hum, kuch aa hi nahi raha hai.
Executive: Sir, bilkul aayega. Kaafi din se aap inactive hai na isliye by-leads aana band ho gayi hai aapko. Active rahenge, by-leads vagarah aana start ho jayengi.
Customer: Are to madam, dekh to raha hu. Consume tabhi to hoga koi aas paas ka koi aayega tabhi to consume karenge usko.
Executive: Accha, nearby location se only deal karte ho aap?
Customer: Nahi, koi aa hi nahi raha hai consume wala tabhi to hum usko karenge. Aapke system me nahi dikhta hai ki dekh rahe hai nahi dekh rahe hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, wo nahi dikhta hai hamare system me ki aap dekh rahe hai ki nahi dekh rahe hai. Koi bhi activity aap karenge na tab hamare system me dikhta hai hamare side ko.
Customer: Madam, consume to hum tabhi karenge jab yu hai koi aayega tabhi to hum karenge. Wo to mai daily dekh raha hu mai isko.
Executive: Accha bilkul aap kaafi dino se use nahi. Haan sir boliye.
Customer: Ek aadhe din jata nahi to mai daily dekhta hu usko.
Executive: Sir, lekin mai yaha se check kar pa rahi hu 90 days se aap inactive hai. Isliye koi bhi buyleads response kuch nahi ho raha hai IndiaMART se.
Customer: Are to madam, consume tabhi to hoga kuch system me kuch aayega. Koi bahar ke aa rahe hai, koi jo hai dur dur ke aa rahe hai. Abhi mai dekh raha tha, abhi mai ek minute bata raha hu kaha kaha aa raha tha.
Executive: Bataye.
Customer: Mai dekh hi raha tha abhi aadhe ghante pehle dekh raha tha usko.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Thakurganj ka aa raha hai, Bihar ka aa raha hai.
Executive: Bihar ka. Ji sir ek ghante pehle consume thodi karenge. Tamil Nadu ka hai. Fir aaya hai Maharashtra ka hai.
Customer: Accha accha. Madhya Pradesh ka hai. Ab ye isme consume tabhi to karenge ye hamare matlab ka aayega.
Executive: Sir, Sonipat Haryana me karte ho aap bhi?
Customer: Nahi nahi. Only Uttarakhand.
Executive: Uttarakhand me. Baki maine aapko kaha hai aapke waha se koi bhi ek ek bhi aata hai to mai bahar ka pakdunga nahi to mai local ka hi pakdunga abhi.
Executive: Only Uttarakhand ka.
Customer: Ji ji ji. Nahi only Uttarakhand ka bhi dur ka nahi wo. Uttarakhand ka bhi dur ka nahi wo.
Executive: Accha accha.
Customer: Jaise aas paas me aapka 40 se 50 kilometer ke range me.
Executive: Accha sir aapka location nearby location mai check kar le rahi hu kya hoga.
Customer: Uttarakhand Haldwani.
Executive: Haldwani.
Customer: Ji. Yaha se 50 kilometer ke area me.
Executive: Accha accha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Baki mai bahar ka bhi pakad lunga magar aapke koi bhi ek request aata hai tab hum bahar ka pakdenge nahi to abhi bahar ka nahi pakdenge.
Executive: Accha accha. Sir, Champawat apne paas hi padta hai kya? Champawat Uttarakhand me.
Customer: Ye dur pad raha hai ye yaha se dur hai kaafi wo.
Executive: Accha iski by-leads aayi hui thi aapko Champawat ki.
Customer: Haan ye ye dur hai kaafi bahut dur hai ye.
Executive: Accha. Dehradun. Haan iske ye to karibn 250-300 kilometer hai wo.
Executive: Accha accha sir. Ekdam paas 50-60 kilometer ke andar me aapko jaise 50-60 kilometer ke jaise Rudrapur ho gaya, Bhedi ho gaya, UP me padta hai Bhedi ho gaya aur baki Khatema ho gaya, Sitarganj ho gaya.
Executive: Haldwani.
Customer: Haldwani ho gaya. Haldwani local ka hai kya?
Executive: Sir, Haldwani ka kal kal hi aaya 9 ghante pehle aaya hua tha Wooden Cottage Construction Services ke liye aapke paas.
Customer: Abhi dekh to raha tha koi local ka nazar to aaya nahi koi dekh to raha tha mai isko.
Executive: Sir dekhiye by-leads to aa rahi hai kaafi lekin matlab ye sold out ho ja rahi hai aapko dekhne se pehle hi. Ya to aap kam use kar rahe honge ya din me ek aad baar use kar rahe honge.
Customer: Dekh to raha hu mai isko.
Executive: Dekh to raha hi hu usko.
Executive: Accha accha. Sir, Wooden Cottage Construction Services ki aayi hui hai to sir jo sold out bhi ho ja rahi hai na aap wo by-leads wale section me ja ke sold out wale me I am interested mark kar denge na taki aage se aapko by-leads aaye to aapko notification aaye by-leads ki to aap usko consume kar paye.
Customer: Thik hai madam, dekh le raha hu.
Executive: Accha accha sir. Aur sir ab active rahiyega please. Aur sir ek aur by-leads aayi hui thi aapki.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur sir ek minute mai bata de rahi hu isme Apartment Construction Services karke Haldwani se hi hai.
Customer: Ji. Isme aap deal kar rahe ho?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi ek deal aayi thi to usse contact nahi ho paya tha wo party kar rahi thi ki hum aapse milenge Diwali pe time pe aaya tha. To party milne ke liye aayi nahi thi usse maine call bhi kari thi. To aayi nahi thi party milne ke liye.
Executive: Accha. Neeraj karke tha shayad Neeraj karke.
Customer: Accha accha. Haan sir. Ji ji ji. Haan. To wo party aayi nahi. Laga lijiye na nearby locations ka Haldwani vagarah ka taki aapko wahi ki list aaye by-leads wale me.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai madam. Thik thik thik. Thik hai sir. Thik hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not actively using IndiaMART.

- Customer claims buyleads are not relevant.

- Customer states buyleads are not appearing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of staying active.

- Executive suggested marking 'Interested' on sold-out buyleads.

- Executive advised using nearby location filters.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the suggested settings.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location filter, active user, sold out
